short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension by Selesti to help bulk manage collections of URLs

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Selesti have developed a new extension for Chrome to help digital marketers quickly and securely flick through a list of URLs in Chrome.

The Slink extension allows you to copy and paste a bulk list of URLs, and then simply click 'next' to load the next one.

If you need to browse URLs in bulk — when performing a backlink audit or competitor analysis, or when updating a large number of page titles — Slink makes it easy.

https://www.slink.link
